title: How to pursue a mathematics degree - Quora

response.answer_text: By joining and completing B.Sc. followed by M.Sc. degrees in mathematics from a reputed university (Some of them require an Honours degree in the subject and others require that it is a subject in all the 3 years of B.Sc. for admission in M.Sc.) or a 5 year integrated M.Sc. degree in mathematics from a reputed institute like IIT's, IISER's, CMI, some of the NIT's etc. This may be followed by a UGC/CSIR NET. and Ph.D. in the subject through research work.
